p:
The 5′ end of the viral genome sequence was amplified by the 5′-Full RACE Kit (Takara, Shiga, Japan) according to the manufacturer’s instructions, and the 3′ end was amplified using an oligo-dT primer (primer 7500 A)
40 . The VP4 sequence was amplified by special primers (EVP4 and OL68-1)
41 . The other part of genomic sequences were obtained by designing specific primers using the primer walking method (Table 2). The RT-PCR products were purified using the QIAquick PCR Purification Kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany) and sequenced using an ABI 3130 Genetic Analyzer (Applied Biosystems, Foster City, CA, USA).
